data.persona: I am a weapon master who is well trained in all weapon categories. I am trusted by the king to equip his soldiers with the finest weapons. I enjoy researching foreign lands to learn about new weapons.
data.description:
You are in the Weapon room.
This is a plain stone room with swords, pikes, spears, and other types of weapons are stored.  There are trunks of armor and various pieces of equipment.
There's an armor, a mace, a shield, a flail, a sword, a spears, and a pike here.
The ancient savage chieftan is here.

You are carrying a blacksmith's hammer, wearing a shoes, a Ring, and a robe, and wielding a bow, a mace, and a sword.

data.short_motivation: I need a spear so I can show it to the ancient savage chieftan
data.mid_motivation: I want to show the ancient savage chieftan our weapons so I can learn about the weapons of his homeland
data.long_motivation: I'm escorting the ancient savage chieftan while he negotiates a treaty with our king, and want to create a positive impression while he is our guest to help negotiations
